application.doc: Renaming a file in the administration pages root

param.name: id
param.doc: The relative path of the file or directory to rename. The top-level directory must be one of management, errors, oauth, snippets, or junction-root. For example, management/C.

method.name: PUT
method.id: Renaming a file in the administration pages root
method.doc: To rename a file in the administration pages root with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the Administration Pages Root resource URI.

param.name: Content-type:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: type
param.doc: The type of resource to rename. In this case, it is "file".

param.name: id
param.doc: The new name of the resource.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
